    There is no .md file associated with this pattern.

    Please refer to the docs for additional information.

    
      
    
      
      
    
        
    
      
    
    
    
  
    
  
    
    
    
      
    Git has not been set up for this project.
    
    
    
    
    
      
    
        Git Integrator:
        
        
      
    
      
    Fepper's Markdown Editor offers integration with Git.
    
      
    By integrating Git, Fepper will automatically pull edits made by other team members each time the Markdown Editor is opened.
    
      
    It will commit and push changes each time a Markdown edit is saved.
    
      
    However, if a team member pushes changes to a Markdown file while it is being edited by someone else, there is a chance that a merge conflict will occur.
    
      
    It is beyond the scope of Fepper to resolve merge conflicts. A developer must do that.
    
      
    Strategies to avoid merge conflicts:
    
      
      
        
    • Communicate and agree that only one person edits a file at a time.
      • 
        
    • Restrict editors to their own Git branch, which a developer will merge into a main branch.
      •
